plot: A new day begins. Beatriz, in front of the mirror, discovers that its smile is vanishing. Without realizing, he initiates an inner trip in which he will try to understand why and to find out if he can avoid it. This one is its search.
title: Sonrisas
plot_es: A new day begins. Beatriz, in front of the mirror, discovers that its smile is vanishing. Without realizing, he initiates an inner trip in which he will try to understand why and to find out if he can avoid it. This one is its search.
